hooks.command: cat | jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""' | xargs -I {} pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks pre-command --command "{}" --validate-safety true --prepare-resources true
cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // ""' | xargs -I {} pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks pre-edit --file "{}" --auto-assign-agents true --load-context true
cat | jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""' | xargs -I {} pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks post-command --command "{}" --track-metrics true --store-results true
cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // ""' | xargs -I {} pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks post-edit --file "{}" --format true --update-memory true --train-neural true

/usr/bin/env bash -c 'if command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1; then pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks session-end --generate-summary true --persist-state true --export-metrics true; else echo "pnpm not available, skipping Agentic Flow session-end hook"; fi'
